author: ajith
msg: The write method of the XMLSchema always serialized all the schemas (including imported ones) and took the first schema. This is wrong behavior
1.Changed the default behavior to serialize only the relevant schema
2.Added a new method to get all schemas as DOM documents

author: tellison
msg: Apply patch HARMONY-357 (Enabling a few more tests)

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1180 (partial): Add vacuous implementations of missing JDBC4
Stubs for missing JDBC 4.0 methods in the embedded driver.
